title: 84/26/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 December 1983 amending Decision 79/277/EEC as regards animal health conditions governing the import of masseter muscles from Argentina, Brazil, Uruguay and Paraguay
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 23 December 1983
amending Decision 79/277/EEC as regards animal health conditions governing the import of masseter muscles from Argentina, Brazil, Uruguay and Paraguay
(84/26/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Articles 1, 2, 3 and 4 of Decision 79/277/EEC, '31 December 1983' is hereby replaced by '31 December 1984'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
